translation.en: Who's there?
Who's there?
Help!
What do you want?
[Bella] "Some say the world will end in fire
translation.fr: "Certains imaginent le monde finir en flammes.

translation.en: Some say in ice
From what I've tasted of desire
translation.fr: Le désir ayant enflammé mon âme,

translation.en: I hold with those who favor fire
But if I had to perish twice
translation.fr: Mais si par deux fois je trépasse...

translation.en: I think I know enough of hate
translation.fr: Je crois connaître assez la haine.

translation.en: To say that for destruction ice
translation.fr: Pour dire que pour la destruction, La glace

translation.en: Is also great
And would suffice"
You know, I've got an English final.
translation.fr: J'ai un exam de fin d'année.

translation.en: I gotta focus.
Marry me.
Marry me.
Change me.
Okay, I will if you marry me.
It's called a compromise.
Let's just call it coercion.
It's not fair.
Marriage is just...
It's a piece of paper.
Where I'm from, it's the way one says, "I love you."
translation.fr: D'où je viens, c'est comme ça qu'on dit "Je t'aime".

translation.en: Well, where I come from, at my age,
translation.fr: D'où je viens, à mon âge...

translation.en: it's the way one says, "I just got knocked up."
translation.fr: c'est comme ça qu'on dit "Je suis enceinte".

translation.en: So, you're worried about what people will think?
You know, two out of three marriages end in divorce.
translation.fr: Deux sur trois finissent en divorce.

translation.en: Well, I think you'll find the vampire/human divorce rate
translation.fr: Tu verras... le taux de divorce entre vampires et humains...

translation.en: is a little lower.
So marry me.
I can't.
I have to be back at 4:00.
Four o'clock on the dot.
That kid trying to brown-nose me now or something?
He has a name. Now he's too punctual for you?
translation.fr: Il a un nom. Le voilà trop ponctuel ?

translation.en: You understand why you're being punished, right?
translation.fr: Tu sais pourquoi tu es punie ?

translation.en: I know, I put you through hell.
Yes, you did.
But I have other reasons for grounding you.
Like, uh...
I just want you to get some separation from him.
translation.fr: Je veux seulement t'éloigner. De lui.

translation.en: Dad, there's nothing you can say.
Edward is in my life.
Yeah, I'm gathering that.
So, all right, how about this?
I'll make you a deal.
You're not grounded anymore
if you use your new-found freedom to see some of your other friends, too, like...
translation.fr: tu uses de ta liberté retrouvée pour revoir tes anciens amis...

translation.en: Like Jacob.
He's going through a really tough time right now. His dad's really worried about him.
translation.fr: Il est dans une mauvaise passe, son père s'inquiète.

translation.en: I remember when that was you.
You needed a friend.
translation.fr: quand il te fallait un ami,

translation.en: Jake was there.
[on voicemail] Hey, it's Jake. Leave a message.
[Bella] Jacob hadn't talked to me in weeks.
I wanted to fix it, he just... He wouldn't give me the chance.
translation.fr: Je voulais y remédier. Il m'en empêchait.

translation.en: ♪ If just for tonight, darling Let's get lost ♪
translation.fr: Tu me manques aussi. Beaucoup. Ça ne change rien. Désolé. Jacob.

translation.en: You scared me.
You're going down to the reservation.
How did you...
Hey, did you do this to my truck?
Bella, you have to understand.
-Your safety is everything to me. -[scoffs]
Jacob's not gonna hurt me.
Not intentionally, but the wolves have no control. Edward.
translation.fr: Pas exprès, mais les loups ne se contrôlent pas.

translation.en: I have until graduation to see him.
translation.fr: J'ai jusqu'à la remise de diplômes pour le voir.

translation.en: And then I'll be one of you, and he'll hate me forever.
translation.fr: Et je serai des vôtres. Il sera à jamais mon ennemi.

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry.
[Mike] All right, check it out. All right. Let's see, we got.
translation.fr: Juste à temps. Écoute. On en est à...

translation.en: -"My fellow students." Right? -Good.
-Cute. -Right? "We are the future.
Anything is possible, if you just believe."
translation.fr: "Tout est possible, si on y croit."

translation.en: -[Eric] Perfect. -And you got yourself a speech.
No, this'll be my speech when I want everyone to throw diplomas at my head.
translation.fr: Ce sera mon speech quand je voudrai me ridiculiser.

translation.en: You gotta embrace the cliches, Jess. They are the bread and butter of all valedictorians.
translation.fr: - Sers-toi des clichés. - Comme tous les majors de promo.

translation.en: Hmm. And that is why you are not valedictorian.
translation.fr: Voilà pourquoi tu ne l'es pas.

translation.en: Jess doesn't need cliches.
The speech is gonna be epic.
Epic? It'll change lives.
I've decided to throw a party.
After all, how many times are we gonna graduate high school?
translation.fr: On ne finit le lycée qu'une fois dans sa vie.

translation.en: A party? At your place?
I've never seen your house. No one's ever seen their house.
translation.fr: - Je n'ai jamais vu ta maison. - Personne ne l'a vue.

translation.en: Another party, Alice?
It'll be fun.
Yeah. That's what you said last time.
Do you need some help with those?
and then you'll be raking it in.
[Mike] Wait a minute. People give you money?
I know you know what she saw. Tell me.
translation.fr: Tu sais ce qu'elle a vu.

translation.en: It was nothing.
You looked worried.
Just that everyone noticed how strange Alice is.
I think that ship sailed long ago.
I wonder what's wrong.
[Edward] Their son went missing in Seattle over a year ago.
translation.fr: Leur fils a disparu à Seattle il y a plus d'un an.

translation.en: Charlie's doing what he can, but...
You know something about this?
We've been tracking the situation in Seattle for a while.
translation.fr: Nous surveillons la situation à Seattle.

translation.en: Unexplained disappearances. Killings.
If the situation gets any more conspicuous, the Volturi will step in.
translation.fr: Si ça s'amplifie, les Volturi s'en mêleront.

translation.en: If they go to Seattle, they could come here. They could see I'm still human.
translation.fr: Ils pourraient venir ici, voir que je suis toujours humaine.

translation.en: It won't get that far.
But we'll go to Seattle if we have to.
translation.fr: Mais on ira à Seattle s'il le faut.

translation.en: [Charlie] I'll fax these down, first thing. [Mr. Biers] Thank you.
You ready for dinner?
It is still just you and I, right?
No, I'm just dropping her off.
See you later.
Bella, my parents wanted to remind you about the airline ticket
translation.fr: Pense au billet d'avion de mes parents,

translation.en: you got for your birthday.
What airline ticket?
A round trip ticket to see Mom in Florida.
translation.fr: Pour aller voir maman en Floride.

translation.en: Well... That was generous.
It expires soon, so you might want to use it this weekend.
translation.fr: Il va expirer. Utilise-le ce week-end.

translation.en: Well, I can't just drop everything and go.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas tout lâcher.

translation.en: It might be your last chance to see her before you graduate.
translation.fr: Tu pourrais ne pas la revoir avant la fin d'année.

translation.en: [Charlie] Well, might not be a bad idea.
Get out of town for a couple days. Get some distance.
translation.fr: Quitter la ville deux jours. Un peu de distance.

translation.en: Yeah, I wouldn't mind seeing Mom.
As long as you use the companion ticket.
Wait. There's two tickets?
That makes me really happy.
[Bella] I did want to see my mom.
I wanted to know that her life was full and satisfying.
translation.fr: Savoir que la vie la comblait.

translation.en: [Renee] Aren't you gonna miss this?
translation.fr: Ça ne va pas te manquer ?

translation.en: Can't you just feel the vitamin D soaking up in your pores?
translation.fr: Tu ne sens pas la vitamine D dans tes pores ?

translation.en: Yeah, I am gonna miss this.
You know, colleges in Florida are a lot sunnier.
translation.fr: Les facs de Floride sont plus ensoleillées.

translation.en: I'm just saying, if you go to the University of Alaska,
translation.fr: Si tu pars étudier en Alaska,

translation.en: I'm never gonna see you.
They have a really great science program.
You mean, Edward program?
The way he watches you,
it's like he's willing to leap in front of you and take a bullet or something.
translation.fr: Il a l'air prêt à se sacrifier pour toi.

translation.en: Is that a bad thing?
It's an intense thing.
You're different with him.
translation.fr: Tu es différente, près de lui.

translation.en: He moves, you move.
Like magnets.
I don't know, we're just...
[Renee] In love. I get it.
I just want to make sure you're making the right choices for you.
translation.fr: Mais je veux être sûre que tu fais le bon choix.

translation.en: You know, 'cause you're the one that's gonna have to live with them.
All right, enough with the heavy.
Congraduation.
I didn't want you to spend any of your money.
Ah, I didn't, come on.
-Are these all our old trip T-shirts? -Mmm-hmm.
Get out! I saved them all.
translation.fr: - Je le crois pas ! - Je les ai tous gardés.

translation.en: I thought they'd make a good quilt, keep you warm up in Alaska.
translation.fr: Ça ferait une bonne couverture, pour l'Alaska.

translation.en: Remember this one? Ensenada.
-The snake pit. -Yeah.
But this one is my favorite, here.
The three-headed lobster from Maine.
translation.fr: Le homard à trois têtes, dans le Maine.

translation.en: This is amazing.
Aw. Honey, I'm glad you like it.
I just figured, you know, when you get older, have kids, we can add to it.
translation.fr: Quand tu auras des enfants, on en ajoutera.

translation.en: Maybe go visit the world's largest ketchup bottle or something.
translation.fr: On ira voir la bouteille de ketchup géante.

translation.en: I'm glad you like it.
Just thought you should have a little piece of me up there in Alaska.
translation.fr: Je voulais que tu emportes un peu de moi en Alaska.

translation.en: I miss you.
[Renee] Oh, honey, I miss you, too.
Are you sure this is where you saw her?
She's almost here.
On your left!
Wait!
She's in their territory.
She'll get away!
No, she won't!
[Esme] Emmett, no!
[exhales] Do you regret going?
It was really great seeing my mom.
Just really hard saying goodbye.
It doesn't have to be goodbye.
Is that why you asked me to go?
You thought I was gonna change my mind?
I'm always hoping for that.
What?
If I asked you to stay in the car, would you?
Of course not.
Charlie said you left town.
Yeah. To visit my mom. Why?
He's checking to see if you're still human.
translation.fr: Il veut voir si tu es toujours humaine.

translation.en: Look, I'm here to warn you.
If your kind come on our land again...
translation.fr: Si vous revenez sur nos terres...

translation.en: Wait, what?
You didn't tell her? Just leave it alone, Jacob.
translation.fr: - Tu lui as pas dit ? - Laisse tomber.

translation.en: Tell me what?
Emmett and Paul had a misunderstanding.
translation.fr: Emmett et Paul ont eu un différend.

translation.en: It's nothing to worry about.
[Jacob] Listen to you.
Did you lie to get her out of town, too?
translation.fr: Et tu as menti pour l'éloigner ?

translation.en: You should just leave.
Now.
She has a right to know.
translation.fr: Elle a le droit de savoir.

translation.en: She is the one the redhead wants.
translation.fr: C'est elle que la rouquine traque.

translation.en: Victoria?
Alice's vision.
I was trying to protect you.
By lying to me.
Okay, we're gonna talk about this, but...
You.
Why haven't you called me back?
I had nothing to say.
Well, I have tons. Hold on.
Edward, you have to trust me.
I do trust you.
It's him I don't trust.
Hey, lose the grin, Jacob. We're just going for a ride.
translation.fr: Ne ricane pas. Ce n'est qu'une balade.

translation.en: Hold on tight.
Are you sure this is a good idea?
I am the vampire girl, remember?
Hey, look who's back!
What up, Bella?
Quil? You, too? -Yep. Finally made the pack. -[boys chuckle]
translation.fr: - Quil ? Toi aussi ? - Me voilà dans la meute.

translation.en: I'm glad you're here, Bella. Maybe we can get a break from Jake's obsessive inner monologue.
translation.fr: Ravi de te revoir. Ça change des monologues de Jake.

translation.en: "I wish Bella would call."
"I wish Bella wouldn't call."
"Maybe I should call Bella."
"Maybe I should call Bella and hang up."
All right, you can shut up now.
Bella, this is Leah Clearwater, Harry's daughter.
translation.fr: Leah Clearwater. La fille de Harry.

translation.en: Hey. I'm really sorry about your father.
If you're here to torture Jacob some more, feel free to leave.
translation.fr: Si tu viens torturer Jacob, pars.

translation.en: Fun, isn't she?
I was wondering when we'd see your face around here again.
translation.fr: Je me demandais quand on te reverrait.

translation.en: [Bella] Yeah. Same here.
Sam, we good?
We're good.
She won't be getting through our line any time soon.
translation.fr: Elle ne reviendra pas avant longtemps.

translation.en: -Cool. -Yeah, that's right boys!
So when did Leah join the pack?
translation.fr: Depuis quand Leah est dans la meute ?

translation.en: Around when her dad died. Her brother, Seth, also phased.
translation.fr: Depuis la mort de son père. Son frère Seth a aussi muté.

translation.en: He's only 15, one of the youngest we've had.
translation.fr: Il n'a que 15 ans. Un de nos benjamins.

translation.en: Sam keeps him home studying, but he's chomping at the bit.
translation.fr: Sam l'empêche de sortir, mais il s'impatiente.

translation.en: I wish it was Leah who'd stay home.
translation.fr: Je préférerais que Leah ne sorte pas.

translation.en: Come on, don't be such a guy.
No, it's not a chick thing.
It's, you know, a triangle thing.
We all have to live the Leah/Sam/Emily pain-fest.
translation.fr: Le psychodrame Leah/Sam/Emily nous prend la tête.

translation.en: Wolf telepathy, remember?
So Sam dumps Leah for Emily?
translation.fr: Sam a plaqué Leah pour Emily ?

translation.en: Yeah, it wasn't like that. Sam hates himself for hurting Leah.
translation.fr: C'est pas ça. Sam regrette d'avoir fait souffrir Leah.

translation.en: But Emily was the one.
I guess it sort of chooses you sometimes.
It's more than some crush, Bella.
translation.fr: C'est plus qu'un coup de foudre.

translation.en: Sam imprinted on Emily.
Do I even want to know what that is?
Imprinting on someone is like...
Like when you see her,
everything changes.
All of a sudden, it's not gravity holding you to the planet.
translation.fr: Tout à coup, ce n'est plus la gravité qui te retient.

translation.en: It's her.
Nothing else matters.
You would do anything,
be anything for her.
Sounds like you know the feeling.
translation.fr: Tu as l'air de l'avoir ressenti.

translation.en: Have you
imprinted on someone?
You'd know if I had.
I just have a direct line to Sam's thoughts.
translation.fr: Je suis en ligne directe avec les pensées de Sam.

translation.en: So for now you're...
still you.
And you're still you.
Until graduation.
Graduation?
You knew this was gonna happen. Not in a month!
translation.fr: - Tu savais que ça arriverait. - Pas dans un mois !

translation.en: I mean, not before you've... You've even lived.
translation.fr: Pas avant que... tu n'aies vécu.

translation.en: Or before I could...
For a second, just a second, I thought...
translation.fr: Un instant... un instant, j'ai cru...

translation.en: But he's got his hooks in you so deep...
I decided this, not him.
Bella, they're not even alive.
translation.fr: Ils ne sont même pas vivants.

translation.en: It makes me sick.
Better you really be dead than one of them.
translation.fr: Mieux vaudrait que tu sois morte.

translation.en: I can't believe you said that.
Edward was right, I shouldn't have come.
translation.fr: Edward avait raison, j'ai eu tort de venir.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
You know, Edward could at least respect meal times.
translation.fr: Edward pourrait respecter l'heure des repas.

translation.en: I was just with Jake.
Good.
I'll just give you two some privacy, then.
Do you understand how worried I've been?
I was perfectly safe.
I almost broke the treaty to make sure--
translation.fr: J'ai failli rompre le traité pour m'en assurer.

translation.en: I know I smell like a dog. -I'm sorry. -No, something's wrong.
translation.fr: - Je sens le chien. - Il se passe quelque chose.

translation.en: Edward, what's wrong?
Someone's been in here.
[Dr. Cullen] Who was it? Someone we know?
This stranger, I didn't recognize his scent.
translation.fr: Un étranger. Je n'ai pas reconnu son odeur.

translation.en: A nomad passing through?
A passerby wouldn't have left Bella's father alive.
translation.fr: Un passant n'aurait pas épargné son père.

translation.en: The scent disappeared about five miles south of Bella's house.
translation.fr: L'odeur disparaît à 8 km au sud de chez Bella.

translation.en: Someone's orchestrating this.
Victoria?
I would have seen her decide.
Has to be the Volturi.
I don't think it's the Volturi, either.
I've been watching Aro's decisions, too.
[Emmett] So we keep looking.
We'll also take shifts guarding Bella at her house.
translation.fr: On surveillera Bella à tour de rôle.

translation.en: Another protection detail?
No, she's right.
You can't protect me, watch my dad and search for the intruder.
translation.fr: Vous ne pouvez pas veiller sur moi, mon père, et rechercher l'intrus.

translation.en: And for Victoria.
And keep yourselves fed.
I'm not leaving you here defenseless.
translation.fr: Je ne te laisse pas sans défense.

translation.en: Well, I'm not gonna let you starve.
translation.fr: Je ne te laisserai pas jeûner.

translation.en: And I wouldn't be unprotected. I have...
[Edward] What?
Whoever it was, he left his stink behind.
translation.fr: Qui que ce soit, il empestait.

translation.en: It'll be hard to miss when we cross it again.
translation.fr: On aura du mal à le rater.

translation.en: We'll handle it from here.
We don't need you to handle anything.
translation.fr: Pas besoin de vous pour ça...

translation.en: Or anyone.
I could care less what you need.
All right, we're done here.
-No, you're done here. -[Bella] Stop!
I'm tired of this. From now on, I'm Switzerland, okay?
translation.fr: J'en ai assez. Je suis terrain neutre, d'accord ?

translation.en: [Bella] Edward hated the idea,
but it wasn't about rivalry anymore.
It was about my safety, and Charlie's.
translation.fr: Il s'agissait de ma sécurité. Et de celle de Charlie.

translation.en: In the days that followed, I got them to at least try to work together.
translation.fr: Les jours suivants, j'obtins qu'ils essaient de coopérer.

translation.en: The wolves took over so the Cullens could hunt.
translation.fr: Les loups prirent le relais pour laisser les Cullen chasser.

translation.en: It wasn't exactly an easy alliance.
Doesn't he own a shirt?
I'm good here. You should go.
I'm not gonna be gone long.
Don't rush. You need to hunt.
Maybe rush a little bit.
-Hey, beautiful. -Hi.
So, what do you wanna do today?
Bike, hike, just hang? Your call.
But we're going to a party tonight.
Are you sure this is okay?
I really hate being a party crasher.
translation.fr: J'ai horreur de m'imposer à une soirée.

translation.en: Technically, you're a council meeting crasher.
You see? The council leaders,
Dad, Quil's grandpa and Sue Clearwater.
translation.fr: Les chefs du conseil. Papa, le grand-père de Quil, Sue Clearwater.

translation.en: She took over for Harry when he died.
translation.fr: Elle a remplacé Harry à sa mort.

translation.en: Okay, I should not be here.
You're okay. I thought...
I mean, they thought it would be good for you to hear the histories.
translation.fr: Ils ont pensé que tu devais entendre les légendes.

translation.en: The histories?
The tribe's histories? Aren't they secret?
translation.fr: Celles de la tribu ? Ce n'est pas secret ?

translation.en: We all got a role to play, and you're part of this.
translation.fr: On a tous un rôle à jouer. Toi y compris.

translation.en: I mean, it's the first time Seth, Leah and Quil'll hear them, too.
translation.fr: Seth, Leah et Quil les découvriront aussi.

translation.en: But you are the first outsider. Ever.
translation.fr: Mais tu es la première étrangère.

translation.en: If I had known that, I would have, like...
translation.fr: Si j'avais su, je me serais...

translation.en: I don't know, dressed better.
It's about time you got here.
Paul's been hoovering the grub, but I saved you some burgers.
translation.fr: Paul avait les crocs, mais je t'ai gardé des hamburgers.

translation.en: Good looking out, bro.
Bella, this is Seth Clearwater, Leah's brother. -Hi. -Newest member of the pack.
translation.fr: Seth Clearwater, le frère de Leah. Le plus jeune de la meute.

translation.en: Newest. Bestest. Brightest.
translation.fr: Le plus jeune, le plus fort, le plus malin.

translation.en: And slowest.
-Come on, your dad's about to start. -Okay.
The Quileutes have been a small tribe from the beginning,
translation.fr: Les Quileutes sont depuis toujours une petite tribu.

translation.en: but we have always had magic in our blood.
translation.fr: Mais la magie coule dans nos veines.

translation.en: We were great spirit warriors,
shape-shifters that transformed to the powerful wolf.
translation.fr: Polymorphes. Se transformant en loup puissant.

translation.en: This enabled us to scare off our enemies
and protect our tribe.
One day, our warriors came across a creature.
translation.fr: Un jour, nos guerriers croisèrent... une créature.

translation.en: It looked like a man,
but it was hard like stone
and cold as ice.
Our warriors' sharp teeth finally tore it apart,
translation.fr: Les crocs acérés de nos guerriers le mirent en pièces.

translation.en: but only fire would completely destroy it.
translation.fr: Mais seul le feu put l'anéantir.

translation.en: They lived in fear that the cold man was not alone.
translation.fr: Ils redoutaient que l'homme ne fût pas seul.

translation.en: And they were right.
She took her vengeance out on the village.
translation.fr: Elle se vengea sur le village.

translation.en: Our elder chief, Taha Aki,
translation.fr: L'aîné de nos chefs, Taha Aki...

translation.en: was the only spirit warrior left
translation.fr: était le dernier capable de sauver la tribu...

translation.en: to save the tribe after his son was killed.
translation.fr: était le dernier capable de sauver la tribu... après la mort de son fils.

translation.en: Taha Aki's third wife could see that he would lose.
translation.fr: Sa 3e femme vit qu'il serait vaincu.

translation.en: The third wife was no magical being,
translation.fr: Elle n'était pas un être magique.

translation.en: no special powers but one...
courage.
The third wife's sacrifice distracted the cold woman
translation.fr: Son sacrifice occupa la femme de glace...

translation.en: long enough for Taha Aki to destroy her.
translation.fr: le temps que Taha Aki la détruise.

translation.en: She saved the tribe.
Over time, our enemies have disappeared.
translation.fr: Avec le temps, nos ennemis disparurent.

translation.en: But one remains,
the cold ones.
Our magic awakens when they're near,
translation.fr: Notre magie s'éveille en leur présence.

translation.en: and we sense it now.
We feel the threat in our blood.
Something terrible is coming,
and we must all be ready,
all of us.
What did you do to me?
I'm so...
Yeah. I know.
We'll find you someone to drink.
translation.fr: On te trouvera quelqu'un à boire.

translation.en: Just try not to get killed, will you?
I'm gonna need numbers.
Seattle is in a state of terror.
translation.fr: Seattle est plongé dans la terreur.

translation.en: Police are baffled by the escalating murders and disappearances.
translation.fr: La police est déconcertée par les meurtres et disparitions.

translation.en: Theories range from a vicious new gang to a wildly active serial killer.
translation.fr: On pense à un gang sadique ou un tueur en série.

translation.en: It's getting worse. We're going to have to do something.
It takes more than one of our kind to cause the damage they're reporting.
translation.fr: Il en faut plus d'un pour causer de tels dégâts.

translation.en: Quite a few more.
And they're undisciplined, conspicuous.
It's newborns.
What, like new vampires?
In the first few months after the change.
That's when we're at our most uncontrollable. Vicious.
translation.fr: Les plus difficiles à contrôler. Agressifs.

translation.en: Insane with thirst.
Something to look forward to.
No one's trained these newborns, but this isn't random.
translation.fr: Personne ne les a entraînés. Mais c'est délibéré.

translation.en: Someone's creating an army.
Well, now we're definitely going to Seattle.
An army of vampires?
And they've been created to fight someone. We're the only clan even close to Seattle.
translation.fr: - Pour combattre quelqu'un. - Nous seuls sommes près de Seattle.

translation.en: [Dr. Cullen] Regardless of why they were made, if we don't put a stop to them, the Volturi will.
translation.fr: Mettons-y un terme, ou les Volturi le feront.

translation.en: I'm surprised they've let it go on this long.
translation.fr: Je m'étonne qu'ils aient laissé faire.

translation.en: Maybe they're behind it.
In Italy, I read Aro's mind.
translation.fr: En Italie, j'ai lu les pensées d'Aro.

translation.en: He wants me and Alice to join him,
translation.fr: Il nous veut, Alice et moi.

translation.en: but he knows we'll never choose him as long as our family's still alive.
translation.fr: Il sait qu'on refusera tant que la famille sera en vie.

translation.en: An army could solve that for him.
Did you eat dinner yet?
Uh, no, I haven't.
This kid, Riley Biers, disappeared over a year ago,
translation.fr: Ce gamin, Riley Biers... a disparu il y a plus d'un an.

translation.en: and his poor parents have been papering Seattle with these things ever since.
translation.fr: Ses pauvres parents couvrent Seattle d'affichettes.

translation.en: You think they should just give up?
Well, I wouldn't if it were you.
translation.fr: Je ne lâcherais pas, si c'était toi.

translation.en: Not ever.
[Bella] I have to figure out what to tell people.
translation.fr: Il faut que je trouve quoi dire.

translation.en: Why I won't be home for Christmases,
translation.fr: Pourquoi je ne rentrerai pas à Noël.

translation.en: and why I won't visit,
why they'll never see me again.
translation.fr: Pourquoi ils ne me reverront jamais.

translation.en: After a few decades, everyone you know will be dead.
translation.fr: Après quelques décennies... tous tes proches seront morts.

translation.en: Problem solved.
Why are you so against me becoming like you?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu t'opposes à ma transformation ?

translation.en: I've told you.
Be honest with me.
There's more.
I know the consequences of this choice you're making.
translation.fr: Je connais les conséquences... de ton choix.

translation.en: I've lived through it.
And to let you suffer that...
You believe I have a soul, and I don't.
translation.fr: Tu penses que j'ai une âme. Pas moi.

translation.en: But to risk yours, just for the sake of never having to lose you,
translation.fr: Mais mettre la tienne en péril pour ne jamais te perdre...

translation.en: that's the most selfish thing I'll ever do.
translation.fr: sera l'acte le plus égoïste de ma vie.

translation.en: I thought that you were afraid that I'd be too different.
translation.fr: Je pensais que tu avais peur que je change trop.

translation.en: You know, like, I wouldn't be warm,
translation.fr: Que je ne puisse plus... te réchauffer.

translation.en: and I wouldn't smell the same.
You'll always be my Bella.
translation.fr: Tu seras à jamais ma Bella.

translation.en: My Bella, just less fragile.
[Bella] Gosh, it's so pretty here.
So, Alice has planned a big graduation party.
translation.fr: Alice veut faire une grande fête.

translation.en: Which you're invited to.
Yeah, I figured that.
I just wanted to do this differently.
Smoother.
But now I'm out of time.
Do what?
You need to hear the truth, Bella,
translation.fr: Il faut que tu saches la vérité.

translation.en: understand all your options.
And you need to know
translation.fr: Et il faut que tu saches...

translation.en: that I'm in love with you,
and I want you to choose me instead of him.
translation.fr: Et je veux que tu me choisisses à sa place.

translation.en: I thought you understood.
I don't feel that way for you.
translation.fr: Je ne partage pas tes sentiments.

translation.en: I don't buy it.
What don't you buy?
That's how I feel.
You feel something else for me. You just won't admit it.
translation.fr: Tu ressens autre chose pour moi, mais tu refuses de l'admettre.

translation.en: So I'm not giving up.
I'm gonna fight for you...
until your heart stops beating.
translation.fr: Jusqu'à ce que ton cœur cesse de battre.

translation.en: Well, then you're not gonna have to fight for long.
You're rushing into it because you're afraid you'll change your mind.
translation.fr: Tu te précipites par peur de changer d'avis.

translation.en: No, I'm not.
I know what I want.
You wouldn't have to change for me, Bella,
translation.fr: Tu n'aurais pas à changer pour moi.

translation.en: or say goodbye to anybody.
I can give you more than him.
translation.fr: J'ai plus à t'offrir que lui.

translation.en: I mean, he probably can't even kiss you without hurting you.
translation.fr: Il doit même te blesser rien qu'en t'embrassant.

translation.en: Feel that?
Flesh and blood.
And warmth.
If you ever touch her against her will again...
translation.fr: Si tu la touches encore contre son gré...

translation.en: Don't do this here!
She's not sure what she wants.
translation.fr: Elle ne sait pas ce qu'elle veut.

translation.en: -Don't do this here! -Let me give you a clue. Wait for her to say the words.
translation.fr: Un conseil : attends qu'elle le demande.

translation.en: Fine! And she will.
Jacob, just go, okay?
[Charlie] Hey, hey, hey! Easy, guys. Easy.
Let's take it down a notch. All right?
What's going on?
I kissed Bella.
And she broke her hand.
translation.fr: Et elle s'est cassé la main.

translation.en: Punching my face.
Total misunderstanding.
[Dr. Cullen] It's just a sprain.
It should heal fairly quickly.
Trying to walk and chew gum at the same time again, Bella?
translation.fr: Tu marchais en mâchant un chewing-gum ?

translation.en: I punched a werewolf in the face.
Badass. You're gonna be one tough little newborn.
translation.fr: Quelle tigresse. Tu feras un nouveau-né coriace.

translation.en: Tough enough to take you on.
Don't worry about it.
Got any leads?
No sign of the intruder.
But Victoria continues to make appearances.
Go blather to someone else about the joys of becoming a newborn.
translation.fr: Épargne-moi ta joie de devenir un nouveau-né.

translation.en: I don't understand what I did to make you hate me so much.
translation.fr: J'ai fait quoi, pour que tu me détestes ?

translation.en: I don't hate you.
I don't particularly like you, but...
Bella, I envy you.
That's ridiculous.
No, it's not.
You have a choice.
I didn't.
None of us did. But you do, and you're choosing wrong.
translation.fr: Ni aucun de nous. Toi, si, et tu te fourvoies.

translation.en: I don't care how miserable your human life is.
translation.fr: Même si ta vie humaine est minable.

translation.en: My life is not miserable.
I mean, it's not perfect. Nobody's life is perfect.
Mine was.
Absolutely perfect.
There were things I still wanted,
to be married, with a nice house and a husband to kiss me when he came home,
translation.fr: Me marier, avoir une belle maison, un mari à embrasser...

translation.en: a family of my own.
Royce King was the most eligible bachelor in town.
translation.fr: Royce King était le plus beau parti de la ville.

translation.en: I barely knew him.
But I was young.
I was in love with the idea of love.
On the last night of my life, I left a friend's house late.
translation.fr: Le dernier soir de ma vie, je rentrais tard.

translation.en: I wasn't far from home.
There she is.
Hey, Rose!
Come over here! Here. Hold this.
Hey, come over here.
We've been waiting for you.
There she is.
You're drunk.
Isn't she lovely, John? I told you she was a looker.
translation.fr: Charmante, non ? Je te l'avais dit.

translation.en: It's hard to say with all those clothes on.
translation.fr: On ne voit rien, avec tous ces vêtements.

translation.en: What do you say, Rose?
-Why don't we take off a few layers? -Stop it, stop it.
I'll see you tomorrow.
Sober.
Hey, where do you think you're going?
-Come back. -Get off me! -Hey. You'll do as I say! -Let go of me! Stop!
They left me in the street, thinking I was dead.
translation.fr: Ils me laissèrent pour morte, en pleine rue.

translation.en: Believe me, I wanted to be.
Carlisle found me. He smelled all the blood.
translation.fr: Carlisle me trouva, attiré par le sang.

translation.en: Thought he was helping me. I'm sorry.
I got my revenge on them.
One at a time.
Saved Royce for last, so he'd know I was coming.
translation.fr: Royce en dernier, pour qu'il sache.

translation.en: I was a little theatrical back then.
Things got better after I found Emmett.
translation.fr: Ça s'arrangea quand je trouvai Emmett.

translation.en: But we'll always be this.
Frozen.
Never moving forward.
That's what I miss the most. Possibilities.
translation.fr: C'est ce qui me manque le plus. Les perspectives.

translation.en: Sitting on a front porch somewhere,
Emmett, gray-haired, by my side,
surrounded by our grandchildren.
Their laughter.
I understand that that's what you want.
translation.fr: Je comprends que tu le veuilles.

translation.en: But there's nothing I'm ever gonna want more...
translation.fr: Mais il ne me faudra rien... de plus...

translation.en: than Edward.
You're wrong again.
After you've been changed, there's one thing you'll want more,
translation.fr: Une fois transformée, tu désireras une chose avant tout.

translation.en: one thing you'll kill for.
Blood.
What did I say about a low profile?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que j'ai dit ? Profil bas !

translation.en: Something's coming.
Something bigger than any of us alone.
translation.fr: Une chose... qui dépasse chacun de nous.

translation.en: And if you can't control yourselves,
translation.fr: Si vous êtes incapables... de vous contrôler...

translation.en: we're all going to die.
What's done is done, just...
translation.fr: Ce qui est fait est fait.

translation.en: clean up after yourselves.
They've already drawn too much attention.
So has our inaction.
Others may begin to question the Volturi's effectiveness.
translation.fr: On pourrait douter de l'efficacité des Volturi.

translation.en: Let them.
Maybe we should consult with Aro.
Aro's decisions are being watched.
We must decide.
Then decide, sister. It's time.
translation.fr: Alors, décide, ma sœur. Il est temps.

translation.en: Yes, it is.
Either we let them do what they were created for,
translation.fr: Faut-il les laisser accomplir leur tâche...

translation.en: or we end them.
Decisions, decisions.
When we were five, they asked us what we wanted to be when we grew up.
translation.fr: À 5 ans, on nous a demandé ce qu'on voudrait faire plus tard.

translation.en: Our answers were things like astronaut, president,
or, in my case, a princess.
When we were ten, they asked again.
translation.fr: À 10 ans, on nous l'a redemandé.

translation.en: We answered rock star, cowboy
translation.fr: On a répondu : rock star, cow-boy.

translation.en: or, in my case, a gold medalist.
translation.fr: Ou, dans mon cas, médaille d'or.

translation.en: But now that we've grown up, they want a serious answer.
translation.fr: Mais maintenant, ils veulent une réponse sérieuse.

translation.en: Well, how about this?
"Who the hell knows?"
This isn't the time to make hard-and-fast decisions.
translation.fr: L'heure n'est pas à se décider,

translation.en: This is the time to make mistakes.
Take the wrong train and get stuck somewhere.
translation.fr: À prendre un train pour nulle part.

translation.en: Fall in love a lot.
Major in philosophy, because there's no way to make a career out of that.
translation.fr: À être diplômé de philo, parce que c'est une voie sans issue.

translation.en: Change your mind, and change it again, because nothing's permanent.
translation.fr: À changer d'avis, parce que rien n'est permanent.

translation.en: So make as many mistakes as you can.
That way, someday, when they ask what we want to be,
translation.fr: Et quand on nous reposera la question,

translation.en: we won't have to guess.
We'll know.
You made it!
Hey. What did you think of my speech?
Too easy-breezy? Too self-helpful? You hated it?
No. I think you pretty much nailed it.
It's like I was born to lead, right?
translation.fr: Je suis née pour commander, non ?

translation.en: I love this song! Let's go.
What are you doing here?
You invited me, remember?
Was my right hook too subtle for you?
That was me uninviting you.
Look, Bella, I'm sorry about, you know,
the kiss and your hand.
I'd blame it on the whole inner animal thing, but it was really just me
translation.fr: J'accuserais bien mon côté animal, mais ce n'était que moi.

translation.en: being an ass.
I'm really sorry.
I brought you something.
A graduation present. I made it myself.
translation.fr: Pour ton diplôme. Je l'ai fait moi-même.

translation.en: You made this?
It's really pretty.
I'll be right back.
Alice, what'd you see?
The decision's been made.
What's going on?
You're not going to Seattle.
They're coming here.
They'll be here in four days.
This could turn into a bloodbath.
translation.fr: On risque un bain de sang.

translation.en: Who's behind it?
I didn't see anyone I recognized.
Maybe one.
I know his face. He's local. Riley Biers.
translation.fr: Je connais son visage. Il est d'ici. Riley Biers.

translation.en: He didn't start this. Whoever did is staying out of the action.
translation.fr: - Ce n'est pas lui. - Le responsable se tient à l'écart.

translation.en: They must be playing with the blind spots in your vision.
[Jasper] Either way, the army is coming
and there aren't enough of us to protect the town.
Hold up. What damn army?
Newborns. Our kind.
What are they after?
They were passing around Bella's scent.
translation.fr: Ils se transmettent l'odeur de Bella.

translation.en: A red blouse.
They're after Bella? What the hell does this mean?
translation.fr: Ils en ont après Bella ? Ça implique quoi ?

translation.en: It means an ugly fight. With lives lost.
translation.fr: Un combat abject. Des vies perdues.

translation.en: All right. We're in.
No. You'd get yourselves killed. No way.
I wasn't asking for permission.
translation.fr: Je ne demandais pas ta permission.

translation.en: It means more protection for you.
Jacob, do you believe Sam would agree to an understanding?
As long as we get to kill some vampires.
translation.fr: Tant qu'on peut tuer des vampires.

translation.en: They'll give us the numbers.
Newborns won't know they even exist.
That'll give us an edge.
We'll need to coordinate.
Carlisle, they're gonna get hurt.
We'll all need some training.
Fighting newborns requires knowledge that Jasper has.
translation.fr: Il nous faut le savoir de Jasper.

translation.en: You're welcome to join us.
All right. Name the time and place.
Jake, you don't know what you're getting yourself into.
translation.fr: Tu ne sais pas dans quoi tu te lances.

translation.en: this is what we do.
You should be happy.
Look at us, working together.
You are the one who wanted us to get along. Remember?
Again!
It's a graduation present.
They don't trust us enough to be in their human forms.
translation.fr: Ils se méfient trop pour venir sous forme humaine.

translation.en: They came. That's what matters.
translation.fr: Ils sont là. C'est le principal.

translation.en: Will you translate?
Jasper has experience with newborns.
He'll teach us how to defeat them.
translation.fr: Il nous apprendra à les vaincre.

translation.en: They want to know how the newborns differ from us.
translation.fr: Ils demandent en quoi ils diffèrent de nous.

translation.en: They're a great deal stronger than us
because their own human blood lingers in their tissues.
translation.fr: Leur sang humain imprègne leurs tissus.

translation.en: Our kind is never more physically powerful
translation.fr: Notre espèce n'est jamais plus puissante...

translation.en: than in our first several months of this life.
Carlisle's right. That's why they are created.
translation.fr: Carlisle dit vrai. Ils ont été créés pour ça.

translation.en: A newborn army doesn't need thousands like a human army,
translation.fr: Leur armée n'a pas besoin de milliers de soldats.

translation.en: but no human army could stand against them.
translation.fr: Mais aucune armée humaine n'y résisterait.

translation.en: Now, the two most important things to remember are, first,
translation.fr: Il y a deux choses essentielles.

translation.en: never let them get their arms around you. They'll crush you instantly.
translation.fr: Ne jamais les laisser vous enlacer. Ils vous écraseraient.

translation.en: And second,
never go for the obvious kill.
translation.fr: ne jamais tuer de façon prévisible.

translation.en: They'll be expecting that,
and you will lose.
Don't hold back.
Not in my nature.
Never lose focus.
One more thing.
Never turn your back on your enemy.
translation.fr: Ne jamais tourner le dos à l'ennemi.

translation.en: Some of you are gonna get hurt.
Some of you could get killed because of me.
translation.fr: Peut-être des morts. Par ma faute.

translation.en: It's gonna be 100 times worse than this, right?
Done for the day.
Are you sure there's nothing I can do to help?
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas vous aider ?

translation.en: Well, your presence alone, your scent, will distract the newborns.
translation.fr: Ta seule présence, ton odeur, distraira les nouveau-nés.

translation.en: Their hunting instinct will take over and drive them crazy.
translation.fr: Leur instinct de chasseur... les rendra fous.

translation.en: Good. I'm glad.
Hey. How do you know so much about this?
I didn't have quite the same upbringing as my adopted siblings.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas eu la même formation que mes frères adoptifs.

translation.en: Those bites are like mine.
Battle scars.
All the training the Confederate Army gave me
was useless against the newborns.
Still, I never lost a fight.
This happened during the Civil War?
translation.fr: C'est arrivé pendant la guerre civile ?

translation.en: I was the youngest major in the Texas cavalry,
translation.fr: J'étais le plus jeune major de la cavalerie.

translation.en: all without having seen any real battle.
Until?
Till I met a certain immortal.
I was riding back to Galveston
after evacuating a column of women and children
translation.fr: après une évacuation de femmes et d'enfants.

translation.en: when I saw them.
I immediately offered them my aid.
Lovely.
And an officer.
You'd better do it, Maria. I can never stop once I've started.
translation.fr: Fais-le, Maria. Je suis incapable de m'arrêter.

translation.en: What's your name, soldier?
Major Jasper Whitlock, ma'am.
I hope you survive.
You may be of great use to me.
Maria was creating an army?
They were very common in the South.
There were constant brutal battles for territory.
translation.fr: On s'y battait sauvagement pour les terres.

translation.en: Maria won them all.
She was smart, careful, and she had me.
translation.fr: Elle était intelligente... prudente... et elle m'avait.

translation.en: I was her second in command.
My ability to control emotions served her well.
translation.fr: Mon contrôle des émotions la servait.

translation.en: I trained her newborns.
An endless occupation since she never let them live beyond their first year.
translation.fr: Une tâche sans fin. Elle les supprimait au bout d'un an.

translation.en: It was my job to dispose of them.
I could feel everything they felt.
I thought what Maria and I had was love.
translation.fr: Je croyais à l'amour entre nous.

translation.en: But I was her puppet. She pulled the strings.
translation.fr: Mais j'étais son pantin. Elle tirait les ficelles.

translation.en: I didn't know there was another way
till I found Alice.
Now, she'd seen me coming, of course.
translation.fr: Elle me vit venir, bien sûr.

translation.en: You kept me waiting long enough.
My apologies, ma'am.
I don't know what I'd have become without her.
You never have to be that again.
[in English] I want you to do something for me.
Kill her.
What is it?
The intruder,
the newborn army,
they're all her puppets.
Alice would have seen if she wanted to make an army.
translation.fr: Alice l'aurait vue créer une armée.

translation.en: Unless she's hiding behind them
translation.fr: Sauf si elle se cache derrière.

translation.en: and she's letting someone else decide.
Welcome to the army.
I'm not just gonna hide while you're out taking all the risks for me.
translation.fr: Je ne me cacherai pas en te laissant tout risquer.

translation.en: If it's Victoria involved, I need to keep you as far away from the fight as possible.
translation.fr: Si c'est Victoria, je dois t'éloigner du combat.

translation.en: Jasper said that I could be of help.
translation.fr: Jasper dit que je serais utile.

translation.en: We won't need your help.
With the wolves in this, it's an easy win.
translation.fr: Avec les loups, c'est la victoire assurée.

translation.en: The rest of us aren't gonna have enough to do.
Okay. Either it's so dangerous that I have to hide
translation.fr: Ou c'est dangereux et je dois me cacher,

translation.en: or it's so easy that you're gonna be sidelined. Which is it?
It's dangerous for you, it's easy for us.
translation.fr: Dangereux pour toi, facile pour nous.

translation.en: I think it's dangerous for us to be apart.
How many times do we have to prove that?
I'll be worried. You'll be worried.
And we'll both be more vulnerable.
Okay, you're right.
So I'm coming with you.
No, we both stay away together.
I can't make you choose between me and your family.
translation.fr: Je ne peux te faire choisir entre moi et ta famille.

translation.en: The only way I can protect you is to be with you.
translation.fr: Je ne peux te protéger qu'en étant avec toi.

translation.en: [Jacob] You're not fighting?
What, did you pull a muscle or something?
He's doing it for me, okay?
Whatever.
Just tell me the plan.
This field will give us an advantage in battle.
We need to lure the newborns with Bella's scent,
translation.fr: On va les attirer avec l'odeur de Bella.

translation.en: but it needs to end here.
Edward and I are going to a campsite.
Even if he carries me, they'll still pick up on our scents.
translation.fr: Même s'il me porte, ils capteront notre odeur.

translation.en: Your stench, however, is revolting.
Dude, you really don't wanna start comparing stinks.
What he means is that your scent will mask mine if you carry me.
translation.fr: Ton odeur masquera la mienne si tu me portes.

translation.en: Done.
This is not a good idea.
Edward, they won't want to get anywhere near his odor.
translation.fr: Ils n'approcheront pas de... sa senteur.

translation.en: Okay. Let's just try it.
Eau de wolf coming up.
Run.
So you gonna ask me to sit out of the fight, too?
translation.fr: Tu me demanderas de ne pas me battre ?

translation.en: Or don't you care about my safety?
Of course, I care. But you'd say no.
translation.fr: Bien sûr que si. Tu refuserais.

translation.en: So I won't have a choice, anyways.
Since I let Sam be alpha male,
translation.fr: J'ai laissé Sam devenir le mâle alpha,

translation.en: I gotta live with the shots he calls.
Since you let Sam be alpha?
I didn't wanna be in a pack, let alone be its leader.
translation.fr: Je ne voulais pas être dans une meute. Encore moins la diriger.

translation.en: Chief Jacob.
Opted out.
But every choice has its consequences.
translation.fr: Mais chaque choix a ses conséquences.

translation.en: Some more than others.
Don't start.
Everybody makes choices. You're gonna have to accept mine.
translation.fr: Tout le monde fait des choix. Accepte les miens.

translation.en: But you can love more than one person at a time.
translation.fr: On peut aimer plus d'une personne à la fois.

translation.en: I've seen it. With Sam, Emily and Leah.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà vu ça. Avec Sam, Emily et Leah.

translation.en: Well, I'm not a wolf. I can't imprint.
translation.fr: Je ne peux m'imprégner comme un loup.

translation.en: It has nothing to do with imprinting.
It has to do with feeling something for somebody.
translation.fr: Il s'agit de nos sentiments envers quelqu'un.

translation.en: And I know you feel something for me.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu en as pour moi.

translation.en: I can sense how I make you feel, physically.
translation.fr: Je ressens ce que je te fais. Physiquement.

translation.en: I make you nervous.
Don't worry.
I promised I wouldn't kiss you again till you asked.
translation.fr: J'ai promis de ne plus t'embrasser de force.

translation.en: You're gonna be keeping that promise for a while, Chief.
All I picked up was wolf stench.
translation.fr: Je n'ai capté que l'odeur du loup.

translation.en: No Bella.
This will work.
Great.
Okay, Alice, don't be a stranger.
Your alibi for the battle is all arranged.
Really?
I told your father that our whole family's going camping this weekend,
translation.fr: J'ai dit à ton père que la famille allait camper

translation.en: so you and I are having a sleepover at my house.
translation.fr: et que tu dormirais à la maison.

translation.en: Charlie's going fishing, anyway.
You guys are on first name basis now?
Me, he likes.
Actually, you and Edward will have the house to yourself tonight.
translation.fr: Edward et toi aurez la maison à vous.

translation.en: Like alone?
We're all going hunting. Powering up for the battle.
translation.fr: Nous allons chasser. Pour prendre des forces.

translation.en: You're welcome.
Hey. You want a sandwich?
No, I'm good.
Well, the sister, I like.
Alice. Yeah, she's great.
Hey, Dad, I was wondering.
Why didn't you get remarried? After Mom.
translation.fr: pourquoi tu t'es pas remarié ? Après maman ?

translation.en: I don't know.
Guess I still haven't met the right gal.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas rencontré l'âme sœur.

translation.en: Why?
I don't know.
I thought you just maybe gave up on the whole institution of it,
translation.fr: Je pensais que... tu ne croyais plus en l'institution...

translation.en: of marriage.
But do you think there's any value in it?
Yeah. Yeah, marriage has value.
When you're older.
Much older.
Like your mother.
It seemed to work out fine for her the second time around,
translation.fr: Ça a l'air d'avoir marché, la 2e fois.

translation.en: later in life.
Yeah, I guess.
I mean, you definitely don't wanna have to get married because you weren't...
translation.fr: Pas question de te marier à cause...

translation.en: careful.
Look, you know what I'm talking about.
translation.fr: Tu me comprends. Il y a...

translation.en: There's things that you need to think about if you're gonna be physically intimate.
translation.fr: des mesures à prendre en cas d'intimité physique...

translation.en: Okay. Don't have "the talk" with me, please.
Well, it's just as embarrassing for me as it is for you.
translation.fr: C'est aussi embarrassant pour moi que pour toi.

translation.en: I doubt that.
And don't bother, 'cause Mom beat you to it like ten years ago.
translation.fr: Et maman t'a devancé de 10 ans.

translation.en: Well, you didn't have a boyfriend ten years ago.
I'm sure things work the same way.
translation.fr: Les choses n'ont pas dû changer.

translation.en: You guys are taking precautions and--
Okay, Dad, please, just don't worry about that.
translation.fr: Ne t'en fais pas pour ça.

translation.en: Edward is old school.
"Old school." Great. What's that? Like, code for something?
translation.fr: Ancienne école. Super. C'est un code ?

translation.en: Oh, my God. Dad. I'm a virgin.
Ah... [gibberish] Okay! Good. Glad we covered that.
Me, too.
Virgin.
I'm liking Edward a little bit more now.
What are you doing outside? What's wrong?
translation.fr: Tu es sortie ? Que se passe-t-il ?

translation.en: Nothing.
It seems only fair that I be represented, as well.
translation.fr: J'ai droit aussi à être présent.

translation.en: It's really pretty.
There's a bed.
I thought you might need one to sleep in.
translation.fr: Il faut bien que tu dormes.

translation.en: I think an air mattress would have sufficed.
Is this too much?
No, it's perfect.
I wanna ask you something.
Anything.
Okay, marriage is the condition for you to change me yourself, right?
translation.fr: Le mariage est ta condition pour me transformer ?

translation.en: Okay. I wanna negotiate my own condition.
Anything you want. It's yours.
translation.fr: Ce que tu veux. C'est d'accord.

translation.en: You promise?
But you said that you wanted me to have every human experience.
translation.fr: Mais je devais vivre toutes les expériences.

translation.en: Not ones that will risk killing you.
translation.fr: Pas celles où tu risques ta vie.

translation.en: You won't.
And everyone says once I'm changed all I'm gonna want is to slaughter the whole town.
translation.fr: Une fois transformée, je voudrai massacrer la ville.

translation.en: That part doesn't last forever.
I want you.
While I'm still me. While I still want you this way.
translation.fr: Tant que je suis moi. Tant que je te désire ainsi.

translation.en: It's too dangerous.
Try. Just try.
I'll go to some ridiculously expensive college -and let you buy me a car. -[laughs]
translation.fr: J'irai dans une fac hors de prix, tu m'offriras une voiture.

translation.en: I'll marry you. Just try.
Stop trying to take your clothes off.
You wanna do that part?
translation.fr: - Tu peux t'en charger. - Pas ce soir.

translation.en: You mean, you don't...
[sighing] That's fine.
Believe me, I want to.
I just want to be married to you first.
You really make me feel like I'm some sort of villain
translation.fr: Tu me fais passer pour un monstre qui tente...

translation.en: trying to steal your virtue or something.
It's not my virtue I'm concerned about.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas ça qui m'inquiète.

translation.en: Are you kidding?
It's just one rule I wanna leave unbroken.
translation.fr: C'est une règle... que je refuse d'enfreindre.

translation.en: It might be too late for my soul, but I will protect yours.
translation.fr: Trop tard pour mon âme, mais je protégerai la tienne.

translation.en: I know that's not a modern notion.
translation.fr: Je sais, ce n'est pas moderne...

translation.en: It's not modern. It's ancient.
I'm from a different era.
Things were a lot less complicated.
And if I'd have met you back then,
I would have courted you.
We'd have taken chaperoned strolls and iced tea on the porch.
translation.fr: Nous aurions eu des chaperons, bu un thé glacé sur le porche.

translation.en: I may have stolen a kiss or two.
translation.fr: J'aurais volé un baiser ou deux.

translation.en: But only after asking your father's permission.
translation.fr: Après avoir demandé la permission de ton père...

translation.en: I would have got down on one knee...
and I would have presented you with a ring.
translation.fr: et je t'aurais offert une bague.

translation.en: This was my mother's.
Isabella Swan, I promise to love you every moment of forever.
translation.fr: Isabella Swan, je promets de vous aimer à chaque instant, à jamais.

translation.en: And would you do me the extraordinary honor of marrying me?
translation.fr: Me feriez-vous l'insigne honneur de m'épouser ?

translation.en: Yes.
You're not coming with us?
It'll be a last-minute decision.
I told you how it works.
The Cullens have powers.
Don't underestimate them, Riley.
You'll have the numbers,
but they'll be able to anticipate your every move.
translation.fr: Mais ils pourront... anticiper vos moindres mouvements.

translation.en: According to your friend?
My dead friend.
Laurent found out about the things they could do,
translation.fr: Laurent a découvert ce dont ils étaient capables.

translation.en: and they killed him.
But not before he told me.
translation.fr: Mais pas avant qu'il ne me raconte.

translation.en: Maybe he was wrong.
I mean, this is supposed to be Cullen territory.
translation.fr: Je veux dire... c'est censé être... le territoire Cullen.

translation.en: We've been tearing it up and I've never even seen them here.
translation.fr: Mais nous l'avons dévasté et je ne les y ai jamais vus.

translation.en: You don't trust me.
With my life. I'm just saying--
I'm doing this for us.
So that we can feed without their retaliation.
translation.fr: Pour qu'on puisse se nourrir sans leurs... ...représailles.

translation.en: I can't live in fear anymore, waiting for them to attack.
translation.fr: Je ne peux plus vivre dans la crainte de leurs attaques.

translation.en: I won't let them.
I am going to end the Cullen clan.
translation.fr: Je vais en finir... avec le clan Cullen.

translation.en: I swear.
I love you so much.
You're going overboard.
If this is all I can contribute, I wanna be thorough.
translation.fr: Si je ne peux faire que ça, je veux le faire à fond.

translation.en: The newborns'll be frantic.
It's okay. Don't make yourself uncomfortable.
translation.fr: Laisse. Ne te mets pas mal à l'aise.

translation.en: It doesn't bother me anymore.
Since when?
Since I spent 24 hours thinking you were dead.
translation.fr: Depuis que je t'ai crue morte durant 24 h.

translation.en: You're not wearing your ring.
translation.fr: Tu ne portes pas ta bague.

translation.en: Well, I didn't want to risk losing it.
translation.fr: Pour ne pas risquer de la perdre.

translation.en: Or risk Jacob seeing it.
I think we should wait to tell him.
I mean, at least till after the fight.
If you're having second thoughts--
I'm not.
I just want him to have a clear head.
translation.fr: Je veux qu'il ait les idées claires.

translation.en: Whose head is unclear?
Nobody's I hope.
Alice says there's a storm coming.
Yeah, I can feel it.
We should get going.
I'll see you in a couple of hours.
Something up?
Bunch of vampires trying to kill me.
Same old, same old.
You should get back before the storm hits.
No, I'm staying.
You'll need my connection to the pack to keep tabs on what's going on.
translation.fr: J'ai un lien avec la meute, je t'informerai.

translation.en: You're not gonna fight?
Seth will spell me in the morning.
He's not happy about missing the action,
translation.fr: Il regrette de rater ça, mais il évitera des ennuis.

translation.en: Let's get you inside.
I should have chosen a site lower down.
No, it's fine. I'm okay.
What can I do?
I can't sleep with all that teeth chattering going on.
translation.fr: Impossible de dormir avec ces claquements de dents.

translation.en: Forget it.
She may need her toes someday.
And let's face it, I am hotter than you.
translation.fr: Admets-le. Je suis plus chaud que toi.

translation.en: Get your hand off me.
Keep your hands off her.
Don't fight.
If she gets sick, it's on you.
Wow, you're freezing, Bella.
Relax. You'll warm up soon.
Faster if you took your clothes off.
translation.fr: Ça irait plus vite sans tes vêtements.

translation.en: Survival 101.
Can you at least attempt to control your thoughts?
translation.fr: Tu pourrais essayer de contrôler tes pensées ?

translation.en: I really get under that ice-cold skin of yours, don't I?
translation.fr: Je te fais bouillir, sous la glace.

translation.en: Are you doubting her feelings for you?
translation.fr: Tu doutes de ses sentiments pour toi ?

translation.en: Nice.
So picking through my brain's okay,
translation.fr: Tu peux m'explorer le cerveau, mais le tien...

translation.en: but letting me into yours, forget it.
I know she's in love with you.
Oh, good.
But she's in love with me, too.
She just won't admit it to herself.
I can't tell if you're right.
Then let me ask you something.
If she chooses me...
She won't.
If she did,
would you try to kill me?
That's an intriguing idea.
But, no. I couldn't hurt her like that.
translation.fr: Jamais je ne lui ferais ça.

translation.en: So you'd just turn her into a blood-sucking demon like you?
translation.fr: Tu en ferais seulement un démon suceur de sang.

translation.en: I don't want that. I never wanted that.
translation.fr: Je ne le veux pas. Je ne l'ai jamais voulu.

translation.en: So stop her.
I tried.
I left.
But you gave up too quickly.
If you'd stayed away another six months,
translation.fr: Si tu avais tenu 6 mois de plus...

translation.en: I could've made her happy.
Trust me.
You have to consider
that I might be better for her than you are.
translation.fr: si je ne vaudrais pas mieux pour elle.

translation.en: I have considered that.
I know you can protect her.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu la protégerais.

translation.en: But you can give her a life, a human life.
translation.fr: Tu lui offrirais une vie. Une vie humaine.

translation.en: That's all I want for her.
translation.fr: Je ne lui souhaite que ça.

translation.en: I'm not going to force her into anything ever again.
translation.fr: Mais je ne lui imposerai rien. Plus jamais.

translation.en: The last time I tried, it almost killed us both.
translation.fr: Ça a déjà failli causer notre perte.

translation.en: Yeah. That I remember.
When you thought she was gone,
that you'd lost her,
how did you cope?
There are no words.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de mots.

translation.en: But I wouldn't wish it on anyone, Jacob.
translation.fr: Mais je ne le souhaite à personne.

translation.en: This might sound odd, but I'm glad you're here.
translation.fr: Je vais te surprendre. Merci d'être là.

translation.en: Meaning,
"As much as I'd love to kill you, I'm glad she's warm."
translation.fr: J'aimerais te tuer, mais merci de la réchauffer.

translation.en: If we weren't natural enemies
and you weren't trying to steal my reason for existing,
translation.fr: si tu ne voulais pas voler ma raison d'être...

translation.en: I might actually like you.
if you weren't planning on sucking the life out of the girl I love,
translation.fr: Si tu n'allais pas aspirer la vie de celle que j'aime...

translation.en: I might...
No. Not even then.
But she could still change her mind, you know.
Then I'd let her go.
Right. Hey, Seth.
Where's Jacob? Did he already--
translation.fr: Où est Jacob ? Il est déjà... ?

translation.en: Not yet.
He's checking to see if the woods are clear before he goes.
translation.fr: Il inspecte les bois avant de partir.

translation.en: I'm really sorry about last night.
That couldn't have been easy on you.
It definitely won't make my list of top ten favorite evenings.
translation.fr: Ça ne fera pas partie de mon top ten des soirées.

translation.en: You have a list?
All ten I spent with you.
Number one is when you said you'd marry me, Mrs. Cullen.
translation.fr: N° 1, celle où tu as accepté ma main. Mme Cullen.

translation.en: This is the 21st century.
I at least want to hyphenate my name.
You're marrying him?
You knew he was listening!
He deserves to know.
-Jake, stop! -Bella, let him...
I'm done! I'm so done!
What can I do?
You can't do anything.
I can, by going out there and killing something.
No! You're not thinking clearly! Don't do that!
Maybe I'll get myself killed and make it simple for you.
translation.fr: Ou me faire tuer, ce sera plus simple.

translation.en: No! Just... Jake, stay.
Why?
Give me one good reason.
Because I don't wanna lose you.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas te perdre.

translation.en: It's not good enough.
Because you're too important.
Still not good enough.
Kiss me.
I'm asking you to kiss me.
That should have been our first kiss.
translation.fr: Ça aurait dû être le premier.

translation.en: I gotta go.
I'll be back.
You saw.
Jacob's thoughts are pretty loud.
I don't know what happened.
You love him.
I love you more.
I know.
It's starting.
Jacob just got there.
He's good.
Someone's hurt?
She's close. I can hear her thoughts.
Seth, go.
She knew we weren't there, but she caught my scent.
She knew you'd be with me.
She found us.
She's not alone.
Riley, listen to me.
Victoria's just using you to distract me.
She knows I'll kill you.
translation.fr: Elle sait que je te tuerai.

translation.en: In fact, she'll be glad
translation.fr: En fait... elle rêve d'être débarrassée de toi.

translation.en: she doesn't have to deal with you anymore.
translation.fr: elle rêve d'être débarrassée de toi.

translation.en: Don't listen, Riley. I told you about their mind tricks.
translation.fr: Ne l'écoute pas. Je t'ai parlé de leurs tours.

translation.en: I can read her mind. So I know what she thinks of you.
translation.fr: Je peux lire son esprit. Je sais ce qu'elle pense de toi.

translation.en: [Victoria] He's lying.
She only created you and this army
translation.fr: Elle ne vous a créés que pour venger son seul amour,

translation.en: to avenge her true mate, James.
translation.fr: Elle ne vous a créés que pour venger son seul amour, James.

translation.en: That's the only thing she cares about. Not you.
translation.fr: Lui seul compte pour elle. Pas toi.

translation.en: There's only you.
You know that.
Think about it. You're from Forks.
You know the area.
That's the only reason she chose you.
She doesn't love you.
Riley. Don't let him do this to us.
translation.fr: Ne le laisse pas nous faire ça.

translation.en: You know I love you.
You're dead.
You won't get another chance like this again.
You want her.
You want me to feel the pain you felt when I killed James,
translation.fr: Tu veux que je souffre comme toi, quand j'ai tué James.

translation.en: when I tore him to pieces,
translation.fr: Quand je l'ai mis en pièces.

translation.en: when I turned him into ash,
when I turned him into nothing.
translation.fr: Quand je l'ai envoyé... dans le néant.

translation.en: Something is wrong.
Alice needs us to go.
Now.
[Edward] How long?
A few minutes. Maybe ten?
[Dr. Cullen] The pack needs to leave. The Volturi won't honor a truce with the werewolves.
translation.fr: Les Volturi n'honoreront pas une trêve avec les loups-garous.

translation.en: Leah, don't!
Jacob. Hold on. Carlisle's gonna take care of you.
The bones on the right half of his body are shattered.
translation.fr: Il a les os brisés du côté droit.

translation.en: Jake, I'm right here.
Jacob, you idiot, I had it!
I need to set the bones before his accelerated healing kicks in.
translation.fr: Je dois faire vite avant sa guérison accélérée.

translation.en: It's already starting. [Edward] We need to get him out of here. We're not gonna win a fight with the Volturi.
translation.fr: Évacuons-le. On perdrait face aux Volturi.

translation.en: We'll take him back to Billy's.
I'll be there soon as I can.
Hang in there, Jake.
It's okay. We got you. We got you.
They're coming.
Impressive.
I've never seen a coven escape an assault of this magnitude intact.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais vu un clan échapper à un tel assaut.

translation.en: We were lucky.
I doubt that.
It appears we missed an entertaining fight.
translation.fr: On a raté un combat amusant.

translation.en: It's not often we're rendered unnecessary.
If you'd arrived a half hour ago, you would have fulfilled your purpose.
translation.fr: Il y a une demi-heure, vous auriez fait merveille.

translation.en: Pity.
You missed one.
We offered her asylum in exchange for her surrender.
That wasn't yours to offer.
Why did you come?
Who created you?
You don't need to do that. She'll tell you anything you want to know.
translation.fr: Inutile de faire ça. Elle parlera.

translation.en: I know.
[groaning] I don't know!
Riley wouldn't tell us.
He said our thoughts weren't safe.
Her name was Victoria.
Perhaps you knew her.
[Dr. Cullen] Edward, if the Volturi had knowledge of Victoria, they would have stopped her.
translation.fr: Si les Volturi la connaissaient, ils l'auraient neutralisée.

translation.en: Isn't that right, Jane?
Of course.
Felix.
She didn't know what she was doing.
We'll take responsibility for her.
Give her a chance.
The Volturi don't give second chances.
translation.fr: Les Volturi ne laissent pas de deuxième chance.

translation.en: Keep that in mind.
Caius will be interested to know that she's still human.
translation.fr: Caius aimera savoir qu'elle est toujours humaine.

translation.en: The date is set.
Take care of that, Felix.
I'd like to go home.
It's been going on for a while.
[Embry] Doc's rebreaking his bones.
translation.fr: Le toubib lui recasse les os.

translation.en: Why did he have to butt in? I could've taken that tick.
Oh, give it a rest, Leah.
The worst is over. He'll be all right.
translation.fr: Le pire est passé. Ça ira.

translation.en: I gave him some morphine,
translation.fr: Je l'ai mis sous morphine, mais ça ne durera pas.

translation.en: but his body temperature will burn it off soon.
translation.fr: Je l'ai mis sous morphine, mais ça ne durera pas. Je reviendrai installer une perfusion.

translation.en: I'll come back to set up a drip.
Thank you.
He's asking for you.
I was worried about you.
You were worried about me?
I guessed Edward would read my thoughts.
translation.fr: Je savais qu'Edward lirait mes pensées.

translation.en: Was he hard on you?
He wasn't even mad at me.
translation.fr: Il ne m'en a pas voulu.

translation.en: Or you.
He's better than I thought.
He's not playing a game.
translation.fr: Il ne joue pas un jeu.

translation.en: Right.
He's not as perfect as you think.
translation.fr: Il n'est pas aussi parfait que tu crois.

translation.en: I know who he is.
Can we just not talk about that?
I'd rather get all the rebreaking done at once.
translation.fr: Je préférerais qu'on me recasse les os.

translation.en: Well, at least I know I did everything I could.
translation.fr: Au moins, j'ai fait mon possible.

translation.en: It wasn't easy making you admit your feelings for me.
translation.fr: Pas facile de te faire admettre tes sentiments pour moi.

translation.en: I only fought them because I knew they wouldn't change anything.
translation.fr: J'y résistais parce que ça ne changerait rien.

translation.en: I'm exactly right for you, Bella.
translation.fr: Je suis celui qu'il te faut, Bella.

translation.en: It would be as easy as breathing, with me.
translation.fr: Ce serait... tellement facile, avec moi.

translation.en: You know I love you.
You know how much I wish it was enough.
translation.fr: Tu sais comme j'aimerais que ça suffise.

translation.en: Should I come back?
I need some time.
But I'll always be waiting.
Until my heart stops beating.
translation.fr: Que mon cœur cesse de battre.

translation.en: Maybe even then.
August 13th?
Yeah. It's a month before my birthday.
I don't need to be another year older than you.
translation.fr: Encore un an de plus que toi.

translation.en: Alice said she could get the wedding together by then.
[chuckles] I'm sure she can.
There's no rush.
I've chosen my life. I want to start living it.
translation.fr: J'ai choisi ma vie. Je veux qu'elle commence.

translation.en: And so you're gonna let Alice plan the whole thing?
The, uh, dress, the reception, the guest list.
translation.fr: La robe, la réception, les invités. Qui sait qui elle invitera.

translation.en: I mean, who knows who she's gonna invite?
Does it matter?
I just don't know why you're doing this.
What? The wedding?
You're trying to make everyone else happy,
translation.fr: Tu veux satisfaire tout le monde.

translation.en: but you're already giving away too much.
You're wrong.
This wasn't a choice between you and Jacob.
translation.fr: Le choix n'était pas... entre toi et Jacob.

translation.en: It was between who I should be and who I am.
translation.fr: Mais entre qui je devrais être et qui je suis.

translation.en: I've always felt out of step,
like literally stumbling through my life.
translation.fr: Ma vie est une suite de faux pas.

translation.en: I've never felt normal.
translation.fr: Je ne me sens pas normale.

translation.en: Because I'm not normal.
I don't want to be.
I've had to face death
and loss and pain
in your world, but I've also never felt stronger
translation.fr: dans ton monde. Mais jamais je n'ai été plus forte.

translation.en: and more real, more myself.
Because it's my world, too.
translation.fr: Parce que c'est mon monde aussi.

translation.en: It's where I belong.
So it's not just about me?
translation.fr: Ça ne tenait pas qu'à moi ?

translation.en: I've made a mess trying to figure all this out,
translation.fr: J'ai tout compliqué, en me cherchant.

translation.en: but I wanna do it right.
And I wanna tie myself to you in every way humanly possible.
translation.fr: Et je veux me lier à toi... de toutes les façons.

translation.en: Starting with a wedding.
Actually,
something a little more difficult first.
translation.fr: il y a d'abord une difficulté.

translation.en: And maybe even dangerous.
We have to tell Charlie.
It's highly dangerous.
It's a good thing you're bulletproof.
I'm gonna need that ring.
